title: League of Legend's new system is a failure!
body:
I have been perma banned two-times! Yes that's amazing according to Riot i'm a psychopath! a toxic human, in their logic i'm having a "bad day a lot".
I played League for about 2-4 years after my accounts got perma banned in the less than 3 weeks. So how could i last 4 years without any bans ever, not even a warning? and when i return to the game, with the new system, i get banned under 3 weeks of gameplay time.


Well first, why you have an ignore buttom in your game, i don't understand that, your logic is, that toxic players that type in chat, are distracting other players because of them typing, my opinion that's their own fault for not ignoring people that are "distracting" them.

Well that's fine, what i'm not fine with is that you ban players base of popularity votes, i have been banned two-times on two different accounts all of them because of PREMADES, always ganging up in a convo, and then mass report after game.

Also i play jungle, and as i jungle i'm always the guy that gets blamed no matter what, why play this amazing role, if you are always the target, for their failures, but don't try to disagree with anybody, you always have to man and take the blame!!!!!, yes i see

Below you can find, there's a pyke support, that's fine it was when pyke first came out, and nobody knew what he was.

After some mins, i get blamed after 10 mins.
Game 3
In-Game
Worst Yi Eú: is pyke even a support?
Worst Yi Eú: i use him in jungle lol
Worst Yi Eú: yeah
Worst Yi Eú: you are late
Worst Yi Eú: gj
Worst Yi Eú: pay attenti9on
Worst Yi Eú: jesus
Worst Yi Eú: thats ur own fault
Worst Yi Eú: for not following
Worst Yi Eú: yeah after 10 mins



Well that's fine you can't disagree as a jungler, you have to man up, and don't mind getting blamed by 3-4 premades, you also can't talk to people!
and try to teamwork like you do in other games, like CS:GO, Overwatch, Paladin and many other teams games, because you can't distract them :) remember, you can't try to call positions. Like below!


Worst Yi Eú: nobody?
Worst Yi Eú: look map
Worst Yi Eú: red
Worst Yi Eú: what
Worst Yi Eú: clos
Worst Yi Eú: wow
Worst Yi Eú: there adc can carry this.
Worst Yi Eú: literally their best carries got kills mid and adc
Worst Yi Eú: 4 bot
Worst Yi Eú: ahri blue
Worst Yi Eú: yours
Worst Yi Eú: they go middle everytime


Also, getting pinged all the time, you can't capslock, and tell people to stop pinging you all the time, just remember you have to ignore them, and not tell in chat.


Worst Yi Eú: GUYS
Worst Yi Eú: HELP!
Worst Yi Eú: LIKE
Worst Yi Eú: WHAT
Worst Yi Eú: THE
Worst Yi Eú: STOP TELLING MF TO SPLIT PYKE
Worst Yi Eú: you just


And if you try to analysis the other team and tell in chat, what they are doing, you are fucking psychopath how dare you! you are obviously distracting everybody in your team, this is a solo game, you can't type.

Worst Yi Eú: they spend more time on jungle than defending towers
Worst Yi Eú: no smite
Worst Yi Eú: gj pyke
Worst Yi Eú: lead them here

Remember again if you get blamed, and try to defend yourself, you are obviously a toxic person

Worst Yi Eú: why pyke
Worst Yi Eú: u lead them there
Worst Yi Eú: WHAt
Worst Yi Eú: TEAM
Worst Yi Eú: WHAtr
Worst Yi Eú: WHYH U GO BOT
Worst Yi Eú: no
Worst Yi Eú: nolbody ddefend
Worst Yi Eú: stop
Worst Yi Eú: go togehter
Worst Yi Eú: wtf
Worst Yi Eú: im gone for 2 secs
Worst Yi Eú: WTF
Worst Yi Eú: IM GONE FOR 2 SECOND
Worst Yi Eú: AND THEY IN SPAWN


Remember when a Garen, is telling you he is trolling and soloing, and you type in chat the reality of the game, then remember you are a toxic person

Worst Yi Eú: NICE SPLITS
Worst Yi Eú: STOP SPLITTING
Worst Yi Eú: GAREN
Worst Yi Eú: MF
Worst Yi Eú: SPLIT ONE MORE TIME
Worst Yi Eú: AND I LEAVE
Worst Yi Eú: HAHHAA
Worst Yi Eú: DO IT
Worst Yi Eú: report garen
Worst Yi Eú: thats why i am 18/7 and u 6/100
Worst Yi Eú: afk farming
Worst Yi Eú: go 1 by 1
Worst Yi Eú: please
Worst Yi Eú: go lose
Worst Yi Eú: f u garen
Worst Yi Eú: report garen
Worst Yi Eú: everybody go solo all game when i tell go together




This is game was played in 40-60 mins,

I hate this game.
I hate you trollers
i hate you SJWs
i hate you people that think a bot system
is better than a person reviewing the game is better. Obviously the bot will make mistakes, and not know the full context you will never see the full context biased of chat.


Banned 0 times with a people system (That was expensive)
Banned 2 times with this new AI system(That is being abused by trollers, feeders and premades, and caught people unguard that don't play this game every single day and know what you can't and write on this AI system). As a player that comes from CS:GO, this type of play in League is counter-productive and keeping the potential of the game back, are people playing their best games, in chat where nobody chats, and bypasses loopholes to not tell their true feelings, i look at top league streamers, and i see their chat is not moving.

Meanwhile in CS:GO if you don't say anything you will be kicked out of the game.


Getting scammed for a lot of money by a bot, the trollers and bypassers.

There's legit a whole indstruy of how to get your account back on League Of Legends, which you created, you created a black market riot, and the people that post down, in the comments hating on this thread will be money hungry bots, that love their money they scam for on the black market telling people they will get their accounts back.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Worst Yi EÃº,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=b7fKavGw,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-11-07T14:44:16.624+0000)
>
> There&#039;s legit a whole indstruy of how to get your account back on League Of Legends, which you created, you created a black market riot, and the people that post down, in the comments hating on this thread will be money hungry bots, that love their money they scam for on the black market telling people they will get their accounts back.

https://i.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/original/000/018/489/nick-young-confused-face-300x256-nqlyaa.jpg
Lol, who falls for scam websites like that?

hold up.
A BLACK MARKET
Well Fuck skins.

>So how could i last 4 years without any bans ever, not even a warning?

Because a player's behavior can change fairly rapidly. If I started harassing people in my games, I'd get banned swiftly, despite 8 years of previous good behavior. That past experience doesn't prevent me from being punished if I start misbehaving now.

>what i'm not fine with is that you ban players base of popularity votes

They don't. 1 report has just as much power as 9: all either does is make the system look at that game for problematic behavior.

> [{quoted}](name=The Djinn,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=b7fKavGw,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-11-07T16:12:34.477+0000)
>
> Because a player's behavior can change fairly rapidly. If I started harassing people in my games, I'd get banned swiftly, despite 8 years of previous good behavior. That past experience doesn't prevent me from being punished if I start misbehaving now.
> 
> They don't. 1 report has just as much power as 9: all either does is make the system look at that game for problematic behavior.

Does this include even if they are reported for different reasons?  Say one for griefing,  one for afking,  one for, iunno, hate speech?  I don't have the list of reportable offences memorized..  ðŸ˜…

To an extent. All 3 examples you gave are different systems. So it would flag the player in that game for each one reported. That is why you can report up to 3 categories though. When you consider people asking for reports, they are trying to get them to report for a specific thing.
What I'm getting from this is that the system USED to be broken, since you were able to play for so long without being banned... and now has been fixed to work correctly.

Really, IMO, threatening to feed/leave if u don't get your way is already toxic

Worst Yi EÃº: SPLIT ONE MORE TIME
Worst Yi EÃº: AND I LEAVE

And so is screaming at your teammates

Worst Yi EÃº: go lose
Worst Yi EÃº: f u garen
Worst Yi EÃº: report garen

You didn't defend  yourself, maybe in the beginning you did, but now u became the aggressor:

Worst Yi EÃº: report garen
Worst Yi EÃº: thats why i am 18/7 and u 6/100
Worst Yi EÃº: afk farming

Report garen
When he is literally inting
afking farming.


He tells me i am bad with 18/7, i mentionhe has 6/100, because he is feeding on top afking farming.


Looking at my chat doesn't make sense thats why the system is broken.

If you look at a reply of gameplay, it would be easy to see what they type to me, and what they are doing.


But you are happy there exist, scamming markets, for getting accounts back, it makes sense, people losing their money with their accounts, and whatever they lose after being scammed on black market, yes i see that makes sense, over people typing bare minium of toxicity!

Well judging by the obnoxious way you type, and the childish way you behave, I'm not at all surprised you got permabanned.  Good riddance.  

Too many kids in this game who act like brats.  Grow up and learn to be decent.  It will benefit you in more ways than you can comprehend.
Well if you got a problem with children then maybe learn how to mute instead of being an annoying shit that literally ruin lifes.

I don't have a problem with children.  I have a problem with people who think they can act however they like, just because they are behind a computer screen.  The mute button is no excuse.

There's nothing wrong with taking a game, or a sport etc., seriously.  That doesn't mean you can't act like a decent, civilized human being.
Hahahahhahha. Losing your leauge account ruins your life? Whoa man i needed that laugh.

mute is a band-aid, not a solution, bans are the solution

dont act like such a child and you wont get punished like one

> [{quoted}](name=XL BENCH PRESS,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=b7fKavGw,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-11-07T15:03:40.503+0000)
>
> Well judging by the obnoxious way you type, and the childish way you behave, I'm not at all surprised you got permabanned.  Good riddance.  
> 
> Too many kids in this game who act like brats.  Grow up and learn to be decent.  It will benefit you in more ways than you can comprehend.

Well arenâ€™t you on your high horse. Nice job in leading by example and treating the op with respect.

You want to treat toxic players who are repeatedly perma-banned with respect?  These SJW snowflakes nowadays 

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Pyke is a support.

He's an assassin support, it's what he was designed as.

Also your logs are super freaking toxic.
O.o

I didn't really see huge problem until you threatened to leave, but actually doing it and just threatening are two different things
I don't think you should threaten to leave at all and that might be deserving of a ban, not a permaban tho
And actually leaving the game is definitely deserving of a ban
and yes a lot of people who int and troll and all aren't taken care of why people who just say things in chat are permabanned even if they aren't inting or anything and I think it needs to be fixed

Premades make no difference. One report in a game is weighted the same as 9 reports. Asking for reports against other players is harassment. Also: Why are your chat logs starting on Game 3? Between the way you type in game and the language in your post, I feel like the system is getting the right people.
So if someone is shouting in my ear and crying about their problems, it's my fault for not making them shut up? I think you got a wrong picture here

Based on your chat logs, behavior and your general attitude toward this, you 1: have a poor understanding of the system, 2 are quite toxic and 3: don't know how to use the mute button.

if you don't want people telling you what to do.
/mute all.
Good riddance.
